properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
LIFERAFT, ORANGE AND BLACK HULL ADRIFT IN
40-20.69N 006-18.97E AT 081210Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO NAVAREA III,
PHONE: 349 5659 9409, 349 5659 9414,
FAX: 349 5659 9396, 349 5654 5347,
E-MAIL: avisosihm@fn.mde.es, ihmesp@fn.mde.es.
